definition: conversation/CL:個|个[ge4],次[ci4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Storing conversational state in the database can be prohibitively expensive.
sentences.chinese: 在數據庫中存儲會話狀態的成本可能難以承受。

sentences.english: The local transaction joins an activity session if one is active.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個活動會話是活動的，本地事務加入其中。

sentences.english: They'll pay less and the data network will function more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 那就是他們會話的更少，同時通信網絡將會更加順暢。

sentences.english: The Transcendentalists organized "conversations" through the Transcendental Club and other means.
sentences.chinese: 先驗論者在超驗主義俱樂部和其他途徑組織會話。

sentences.english: This function begins by unblocking all signals and setting the session key ring.
sentences.chinese: 該函數首先解鎖所有信號並設置會話密鑰環。

sentences.english: It could support the appropriate proxying needed to reattach sessions.
sentences.chinese: 它應該能夠支持適當的代理以重新掛接會話。

sentences.english: Specifies the unique numeric string that identifies the server session.
sentences.chinese: 指定唯一的數字串來識別服務器會話。

sentences.english: Being a communication graduate, I specialize in Business English and Conversational English.
sentences.chinese: 當一個大學畢業生，我專攻商用英文以及會話英文。

sentences.english: There are many implementation details that make finding sessions and their values non-trivial.
sentences.chinese: 還有許多實現細節使得發現會話及其值並不容易。

sentences.english: The Maximum Messages value is set on the listener port, along with the Maximum Sessions concurrency setting.
sentences.chinese: 在偵聽器端口設置最大消息值及最大會話併發數。
所支持協議間的協議會話。

sentences.english: One solution is to only use sessions where you need them.
sentences.chinese: 一個解決方案是，只在需要會話的地方使用會話。

sentences.english: One solution is to only use sessions where you need them.
sentences.chinese: 一個解決方案是，只在需要會話的地方使用會話。

sentences.english: Session data can be used to greatly simplify accessing information.
sentences.chinese: 會話數據可用於大大簡化信息的訪問。

sentences.english: Such conversations are taking place today on corporate intranets.
sentences.chinese: 今天，這些會話已開始蔓延到企業內部。

definition: (spoken) Chinese language
to act in a play/to put on a play
knack of doing business/business sense
to touch on sth and leave it there/to take care not to overdo sth
to attend a lecture/to listen to a talk
layman
saying in which the second part, uttered after a pause or totally left out, is the intended meaning of the allegory presented in the first part
lit. doesn't (even) enter a single aperture (of one's head)/I don't understand a word (idiom)/it's all Greek to me
grandma (paternal) (Tw)/(dialect) mother/nurse/amah/(Manchu) father
passionate love (idiom)
to sleep (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 睡覺|睡觉[shui4 jiao4]
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
(dialect) key/Taiwan pr. [suo3 shi5]
to be out of form/not to be oneself
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
